title: Reconnaissance and enumerationWhen
extract: The enumeration phase is the phase where the information of the reconnaissance phase will be in use the first time. The enumeration procedure impacts for example active actions taken by cyber attackers to gain system access and of course the important attack vectors or schemes.
extract_html: The enumeration phase is the phase where the information of the reconnaissance phase will be in use the first time. The enumeration procedure impacts for example active actions taken by cyber attackers to gain system access and of course the important attack vectors or schemes.
